strategicProfiles.pageDescription: Tonda brand profiles nga zirina knowledge bases era oziyunge ku social accounts
strategicProfiles.alertTitle: Strategic Profiles ze Bwongo bwo obwa Brand
strategicProfiles.alertDescription: Buli profile erimu okumanya okw’enjawulo, engeri y’okuwandiika, n’ebigambo ebikulu ebya SEO. Teeka ebiwandiiko okuzimba ekifo ky'okumanya ekilungamya okukola ebirimu bya AI. Link social accounts okufulumya butereevu okuva mu buli mbeera ya profile.
strategicProfiles.defaultProfileDesc: Profaayilo yo enkulu eyungiddwa ku nteekateeka za akawunti
strategicProfiles.personalDesc: Ku lw’ekintu kyo oba eddoboozi lyo
strategicProfiles.companyDesc: Ku bikwata ku bitongole, eby’ebintu, oba ebya kampeyini
strategicProfiles.contentLanguageHelper: Olulimi lw'ebirimu ebikoleddwa AI (empty = kozesa default okuva mu Settings)
strategicProfiles.seoKeywordsHelper: Okwongerako ebigambo ebikulu okulongoosa ebirimu okunoonya
strategicProfiles.supportedFormats: Ewagirwa: PDF, Ekigambo, Excel, PowerPoint, Ebiwandiiko, Markdown, CSV
strategicProfiles.linkedSocialAccount: Akawunti ya Social eyungiddwa ku nsonga eno
strategicProfiles.profileNamePlaceholder: e.g., Ekika ky’okutunda, Tech Blog, Personal

bonusMetadata.title: Ensengeka za Profile ez’omulembe
bonusMetadata.targetAudiencePlaceholder: Nnyonnyola abantu b’otunuulidde (e.g., abakugu mu by’okutunda ab’emyaka 25-45 abafaayo ku tekinologiya)
bonusMetadata.targetAudienceHelper: Ayamba AI okutunga eddoboozi n’ebirimu eri abakuwuliriza bo abamu
bonusMetadata.referenceWebsiteHelper: Omukutu gwa yintaneeti ogulina tone/style gyoyagala okukoppa

strategicProfiles.selectSocialAccount: Londa akawunti ya social gy’ogenda okukwatagana nayo
strategicProfiles.noSocialAccounts: Tewali social accounts zazuuliddwa. Gatta akawunti mu

featureDisabled.title: Ekintu Tekisobozeseddwa
featureDisabled.message: Olukusa lwa granular terunnaba kukozesebwa ku kitongole kyo. Tuukirira omuddukanya wo okusobozesa ekintu kino.

settings.universalDocsDescription: Gano ge mateeka go ag’obuntu ag’okugoberera (Level 2). Enkola zino zikwata ku bintu BYONNNA by’okola, eby’obuntu n’ebya kkampuni. Teeka wano by'oyagala, ebikugira, n'amateeka g'omusono.
settings.personalComplianceInfo: Amateeka gano gakeberebwa ku profile zo ZONNA. Ku mateeka agakwata ku kkampuni, genda ku Enterprise Settings.
settings.reportsDescription: Wano wefunire lipoota enzijuvu ez’okukebera akabi n’okwekenneenya ebirimu
settings.pdfReportDescription: Mulimu okwekenneenya akabi, okwekenneenya okugoberera amateeka, okutegeera ebikwata ku buwangwa, n’okwekenneenya ebirimu okukolebwa LLM
settings.dangerZoneDescription: Ssaako akawunti yo enkalakkalira ne data yonna ekwatagana nayo
settings.deleteAccountDescription: Bw’omala okusazaamu akawunti yo, tewali kudda mabega. Data yo yonna omuli ebiwandiiko, okwekenneenya, ebirimu ebitegekeddwa, n’okuteekawo bijja kuggyibwawo enkalakkalira.
settings.noHistoryFound: Tewali byafaayo byazuuliddwa. Tandika okwekenneenya ebirimu okulaba omulimu gwo wano.
settings.purchaseCreditsDesc: Gula ebbanja ery’enjawulo oba okulongoosa obuwandiike bwo okufuna ebbanja eddene buli mwezi.
settings.choosePlanDesc: Londa enteekateeka etuukana n’ebyetaago byo. Credits ezitakozesebwa zigenda mu mwezi ogujja!
settings.extraCreditsDesc: Gula packs endala ez’okuwola essaawa yonna. Credit zino teziggwaako era ziyiringisibwa buli mwezi!
settings.noPaymentMethod: Tewali nkola ya kusasula ku fayiro.
settings.creditsAddedInstantly: Credits zongerwako mangu era teziggwaako. Bayiringisibwa okutuuka ku mwezi ogujja!
settings.unusedCreditsRollover: Credits ezitakozesebwa ziyiringisibwa okutuuka ku mwezi oguddako!

enterprise.title: Dashboard y’ekitongole
enterprise.creator: Omutonzi
enterprise.createCompanyDesc: Tonda kampuni okusumulula ebikozesebwa bya ttiimu, ebifo eby’okumanya ebigabanyizibwa, n’enkola y’emirimu gy’ebirimu ey’okukolagana.
enterprise.becomeAdmin: Ojja kufuuka Company Admin nga olina obuyinza obujjuvu.
enterprise.onlyAdminsCanManage: Company Admins bokka be basobola okuddukanya okumanya kwa kampuni n'ensengeka za ttiimu. Tuukirira admin wo okufuna enkyukakyuka.
enterprise.companyDescPlaceholder: Ennyonyola ennyimpimpi ku kkampuni yo (nga tolina kulonda) .
enterprise.createAsAdminNote: Nga omutonzi, ojja kuba Company Admin ng'olina olukusa olujjuvu okuddukanya ttiimu n'okumanya.
enterprise.knowledgeBaseDesc: Ebiwandiiko ebiteekeddwa wano bikwata ku bammemba ba ttiimu bonna mu byonna ebirimu. Amateeka gano ge gasinga okukulembeza era gasukkuluma ku nsengeka z’omukozesa ssekinnoomu ne profile.
enterprise.uploadCompanyDocsHint: Enkola z’ekika, enkola z’amateeka, ebiwandiiko ebikwata ku kugoberera, enkola z’emikutu gy’empuliziganya
enterprise.noCompanyDocs: Tewali biwandiiko bya kkampuni biteekeddwa ku mukutu. Tandika ng’oteeka ku mukutu ebiragiro byo eby’ekika ky’ebintu oba ebiwandiiko ebikwata ku kugoberera amateeka.
enterprise.teamMembersDesc: Dukanya bammemba ba ttiimu yo n’emirimu gyabwe. Admins basobola okuteeka ebiwandiiko bya company nebaddukanya team.
enterprise.leaveCompanyWarning: Muve mu kkampuni eno. Bwoba nga oli admin wekka, olina okusooka okutumbula member omulala.
enterprise.loseAccessWarning: Ojja kufiirwa okuyingira mu kumanya kwa kkampuni n’ebintu bya ttiimu.
enterprise.adminLeaveWarning: Nga admin, olina okukuza member omulala ku admin nga tonnagenda.
enterprise.enterEmailAddress: Nsaba oyingize email address y'omuntu gw'oyagala okuyita.
enterprise.enterValidEmail: Nsaba oyingize endagiriro ya email entuufu.
enterprise.documentAddedToKnowledge: {{filename}} eyongezeddwa ku musingi gw'okumanya kwa kkampuni.
enterprise.memberRoleChanged: Omulimu gwa mmemba gwakyusiddwa ne gufuuka {{role}}.
enterprise.addPersonalNote: Ku kuyita kwo yongerako akawandiiko ak'obuntu...

dashboard.title: Dashboard y’ekitongole
dashboard.scoreDescriptions: Okusinziira ku bubonero bw’okwekenneenya AI: Kirungi nnyo (85-100), Kirungi (75-84), kya wakati (60-74), Mbi (40-59), Ebikulu (0-39)
dashboard.accessDeniedDesc: Abaddukanya ebitongole bokka be basobola okuyingira ku mukutu guno

analytics.scoreTrendsDesc: Okutwaliza awamu, Compliance & Cultural scores trend (emyezi 6)
analytics.geographicDistributionDesc: Nywa ku markers olabe ensengeka y’abantu okusinziira ku nsi
analytics.costAnalysisDesc: Ensimbi ezisaasaanyizibwa mu kukola ku AI n’okulondoola embalirira

scheduledPosts.approvedReadyDesc: Ebiwandiiko ebikkirizibwa nga byetegefu okuteekebwateekebwa oba okufulumizibwa.
scheduledPosts.scheduledPostsDesc: Ebiwandiiko nga byetegefu okufulumizibwa mu kiseera kyabyo ekitegekeddwa.

scheduledPosts.rejectionFeedbackNote: Endowooza eno ejja kusindikibwa eri omutonzi okubayamba okulongoosa post.

toasts.postApprovedDesc: Ekifo kino kiyisiddwa era nga kyetegefu okuteekebwateekebwa.
toasts.postReturnedDesc: Post ezzeemu okusindikibwa eri omutonzi n'endowooza yo.

toasts.connectSocialFirst: Nkusaba osooke oyunge ku social accounts zo mu Settings > Social Accounts

documentation.title: Obuyambi & Ebiwandiiko
documentation.subtitle: Funa ebiragiro n'ebikozesebwa okukuyamba okufuna ebisingawo mu Contentry. Londa ekiragiro okusinziira ku kifo kyo.

whatsNew.title: Ebipya Ebipya
whatsNew.description: Ebipya ebizuuliddwa mu ngeri ey’otoma n’ebintu ebipya eby’ongerwa ku mukutu
whatsNew.subtitle: Enkyukakyuka n’ebipya ebizuuliddwa mu ngeri ey’otoma ku mukutu
whatsNew.feature1: Enkyukakyuka za UI ezizuuliddwa mu ngeri ey’okwekolako

adminGuide.title: Admin Guide
adminGuide.description: Ekitabo ekijjuvu eri abaddukanya omukutu. Yiga engeri y'okuddukanyaamu abakozesa, okulondoola okwekenneenya, n'okusengeka ensengeka z'enkola.

enterpriseGuide.title: Ekitabo ekikwata ku bitongole
enterpriseGuide.description: Ekitabo ekilungamya abaddukanya kkampuni. Yiga okuddukanya ttiimu yo, okuteekawo ebifo eby’okumanya, n’okukwata okukkirizibwa kw’ebirimu.

userGuide.title: Ekitabo ky’Omukozesa
userGuide.description: Byonna by’olina okukola, okwekenneenya, n’okufulumya ebirimu. Kituukiridde eri abatonzi b'ebirimu n'abasuubuzi.

overview.intro: Nga omuddukanya omukutu, olina okufuna ebikozesebwa ebijjuvu eby’okulondoola n’okuddukanya omukutu gwonna ogwa Contentry. Ekitabo kino kijja kukuyamba okutegeera obusobozi bwo obw’okuddukanya emirimu.
overview.dashboardDesc: Admin Dashboard ekuwa ekifaananyi ky’ekinyonyi ku mirimu gya pulatifomu n’obulamu.
overview.feature1: Okulondoola emirimu gy’abakozesa mu kiseera ekituufu
overview.feature4: Okutuuka amangu ku mirimu emikulu egy’okuddukanya emirimu
overview.tip: Kyalira Admin Dashboard buli kiseera okubeera ng’omanyi ebikwata ku mitendera gy’omukutu n’okuzuula ensonga eziyinza okubaawo nga bukyali.

userManagement.intro: Okuddukanya abakozesa mulimu omukulu ogw’okuddukanya ogukusobozesa okulabirira abakozesa bonna n’ebitongole ku mukutu.
userManagement.viewUsersDesc: Yingira mu kitundu ky'Okuddukanya Omukozesa okulaba, okunoonya, n'okuddukanya abakozesa bonna abakozesa omukutu.
userManagement.feature1: Noonya era osengejje abakozesa okusinziira ku mannya, email, oba omulimu
userManagement.feature2: Laba ebikwata ku bakozesa mu bujjuvu n'ebyafaayo by'emirimu
userManagement.feature4: Deactivate oba sazaamu akawunti z'abakozesa bwe kiba kyetaagisa
userManagement.rolesDesc: Okuvuganya kulina emirimu esatu emikulu egy’abakozesa:
userManagement.role1: Admin: Okuyingira mu nkola mu bujjuvu nga olina obusobozi bw'okusengeka enkola
userManagement.role2: Enterprise Admin: Addukanya ttiimu ya kkampuni yaabwe n'ensengeka
userManagement.role3: Omukozesa: Ebintu ebituufu eby’okukola n’okwekenneenya ebirimu
userManagement.warning: Bulijjo kakasa enkosa nga tonnakyusa mirimu gya bakozesa oba okusazaamu akawunti. Ebikolwa bino biyinza okukosa enkola y’emirimu gya ttiimu.

analytics.intro: Okwekenenya kuwa amagezi amazito ku ngeri omukutu guno gye gukozesebwamu mu bitongole byonna n’abakozesa.
analytics.metric5: Obubonero bw’okugoberera n’akabi mu bitongole byonna
analytics.tip: Lipoota z’okwekenneenya ebweru w’eggwanga olw’ennyanjula z’abakwatibwako ng’okozesa ekintu kya Download Report.

financials.intro: Ekitundu eky’okulaba eby’ensimbi kiwa okulabika mu nfuna y’omukutu n’ebipimo by’okuwandiika.
financials.revenueDesc: Londoola obulamu bw’ebyensimbi n’emitendera gy’okuwandiika mu bitongole byonna.

systemConfig.intro: Ensengeka y'enkola ekusobozesa okuddukanya ensengeka n'okugatta mu nkola yonna.
systemConfig.integration2: Empeereza za AI ez’okukola ebirimu n’okwekenneenya
systemConfig.tip: Bulijjo gezaako okugatta mu mbeera y'okuteeka mu siteegi nga tonnaba kukola nkyukakyuka mu nsengeka z'okufulumya.

gettingStarted.intro: Mwaniriziddwa mu Contentry! Nga Enterprise Administrator, olina ebikozesebwa okuddukanya ttiimu yo, okuteekawo ebiragiro ebirimu, n’okukakasa nti brand ekwatagana.
gettingStarted.setupDesc: Goberera emitendera gino okuteekawo akawunti yo ey’ekitongole:
gettingStarted.step1: Genda ku Settings > Enterprise okuyingira ku dashboard ya kkampuni yo
gettingStarted.step2: Teeka ebiragiro n’enkola za kkampuni yo ku kika kya kkampuni yo ku Knowledge Base
gettingStarted.step3: Yita bammemba ba ttiimu yo era owe emirimu egisaanidde
gettingStarted.step4: Tegeka enkola z'emirimu gy'okukkiriza okwekenneenya ebirimu
gettingStarted.tip: Maliriza enteekateeka yo eya Knowledge Base nga tonnayita bammemba ba ttiimu okukakasa nti bafuna ebiragiro ebikwata ku kika okuva ku lunaku olusooka.

teamManagement.intro: Enzirukanya ya ttiimu ennungi ekakasa enkolagana ennungi n’okufuga okutuufu okuyingira mu kibiina kyo.
teamManagement.inviteDesc: Yongera bammemba abapya ku ttiimu yo ey'ekitongole:
teamManagement.feature1: Yingiza endagiriro ya email ya mmemba wa ttiimu
teamManagement.feature2: Londa omulimu gwabwe (Omutonzi, Maneja, oba Admin)
teamManagement.feature3: Ku kuyita kwongera ku bubaka obw’obuntu obw’okwesalirawo
teamManagement.rolesDesc: Gabira emirimu nga osinziira ku buvunaanyizibwa:
teamManagement.role1: Omutonzi: Asobola okukola n’okuweereza ebirimu okukkirizibwa
teamManagement.role2: Manager: Asobola okukkiriza/okugaana ebirimu n'okuddukanya abatonzi
teamManagement.role3: Admin: Okuyingira mu kitongole mu bujjuvu omuli okusasula ssente n'okuteekawo
teamManagement.tip: Okuyita abantu kuggwaako oluvannyuma lw'ennaku 7. Jjukiza bammemba ba ttiimu okukkiriza mu bwangu okuyitibwa kwabwe.

knowledgeBase.intro: Knowledge Base ye tterekero lya kkampuni yo ery’omu makkati erikwata ku ndagiriro z’ekika, enkola, n’amateeka agakwata ku birimu. Ebiwandiiko ebiteekeddwa wano bitegeeza ebirimu ebikoleddwa AI eri bammemba ba ttiimu bonna.
knowledgeBase.uploadDesc: Okwongerako ebiwandiiko ebijja okulungamya okukola ebirimu:
knowledgeBase.docType1: Ebiragiro ku sitayiro ya brand n’ebiragiro by’eddoboozi
knowledgeBase.docType3: Enkola y'okuteeka ku mikutu gya yintaneeti
knowledgeBase.tip: Sooka oteeke ebiragiro byo ebisinga obukulu ku brand. AI ekulembeza ebiwandiiko mu Knowledge Base ya kkampuni okusinga ebiteekebwa ku mukutu gw’abakozesa ssekinnoomu.

approvalWorkflow.intro: Enkola y’emirimu gy’okukkiriza ekakasa nti ebirimu byonna bituukana n’omutindo gwa kkampuni yo nga tonnafulumya.
approvalWorkflow.processDesc: Ebirimu bikulukuta okuyita mu mitendera gino:
approvalWorkflow.step4: Ebintu ebikkirizibwa bisobola okufulumizibwa ku mikutu gy’empuliziganya
approvalWorkflow.warning: Ssobozesa ebyetaago by'okukkiriza mu Nsengeka okukakasa nti ebirimu byonna byekenneenyezebwa nga tebinnaba kufulumya.

billing.intro: Dukanya okuwandiika kwo mu kitongole n’okulondoola enkozesa y’ebbanja.
billing.feature1: Ebikwata ku nteekateeka eriwo kati n’okugaba ebbanja

adminUsersPage.title: Enzirukanya y’abakozesa
adminUsersPage.subtitle: Dukanya abakozesa ku mukutu gwonna
adminUsersPage.confirmDelete: Okakasa nti oyagala kusazaamu mukozesa ono?

deleteModal.title: Ssazaamu Omukozesa
deleteModal.description: Kino kijja kusazaamu enkalakkalira omukozesa ne data yonna ekwatagana nayo:

gettingStarted.intro: Mwaniriziddwa mu Contentry! Ekitabo kino kijja kukuyamba okukola ebirimu ebisikiriza, ebikwatagana n’amateeka ng’okozesa ebikozesebwa ebikozesa AI.
gettingStarted.step1: Teekawo profile yo nga erimu amawulire amatuufu
gettingStarted.step3: Tonda Strategic Profile ku brand yo oba kampeyini yo
gettingStarted.tip: Tandika ne Strategic Profile okukakasa nti ebirimu byo byonna bikuuma tone n’obubaka obutakyukakyuka.

contentCreation.intro: Contentry's AI-powered content generation ekuyamba okukola ebiwandiiko ebisikiriza mu sikonda ntono.
contentCreation.feature1: Yingiza omulamwa oba ekibuuzo ng’onnyonnyola ky’oyagala okuteeka ku mukutu
contentCreation.feature2: Londa emikutu gy’ogenderera (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, n’ebirala)
contentCreation.schedule2: Londa ennaku n’ebiseera ebitongole eby’okuteeka mu nkola mu ngeri ey’otoma
contentCreation.schedule3: Ssobozesa okuwandiika mu ngeri ey’okwekolako oba okwekenneenya mu ngalo nga tonnaba kufulumya
contentCreation.tip: Kozesa akabokisi akalaga nti ‘Promotional Content’ ng’okola ebiwandiiko by’okutunda okukakasa nti okwekenneenya okugoberera amateeka kulowooza ku ndagiriro z’okutumbula.

analyzeContent.intro: Ekintu kya Analyze Content kyetegereza ebirimu byo okulaba oba bigoberera, okukwatagana n’obuwangwa, n’okukwatagana n’akabonero.
analyzeContent.step1: Genda ku Content Moderation > Yeekenneenya Ebirimu
analyzeContent.step2: Teeka ebirimu byo mu kitundu ky’ebiwandiiko
analyzeContent.step3: Londa Strategic Profile okusinziira ku mbeera
analyzeContent.step4: Nywa ku Analyze okufuna ebikwata ku nsonga eno mu bujjuvu
analyzeContent.type3: Eddoboozi lya brand n’obutakyukakyuka bwa tone
analyzeContent.tip: Bulijjo okwekenneenya ebirimu nga tonnabifulumya ku mikutu egy’ebweru naddala ku kampeyini ezitunuulidde ebitundu ebingi.

strategicProfiles.intro: Strategic Profiles zitegeeza embeera, eddoboozi, n’ebiragiro ebikwata ku kutondawo n’okwekenneenya ebirimu.
strategicProfiles.feature3: Teeka ebiwandiiko ebikwata ku pulofayilo n’ebiragiro
strategicProfiles.tip: Tonda Strategic Profiles ez’enjawulo ku kampeyini ez’enjawulo, brands, oba obutale bw’ekitundu.

socialAccounts.intro: Yunga akawunti zo ez’emikutu gy’empuliziganya okufulumya ebirimu butereevu okuva mu Contentry.
socialAccounts.warning: Kuuma emikutu gyo egya social account nga gibeera ku mulembe. Tokens eziggwaako ziyinza okulemesa ebiwandiiko ebitegekeddwa okufulumya.

approvalProcess.intro: Singa ekitongole kyo kiba n'enkola z'emirimu ez'okukkiriza ezisobozeseddwa, ebirimu birina okwekenneenya nga tebinnaba kufulumya.
approvalProcess.step2: Nywa ku 'Submit for Approval' okuweereza eri maneja wo
approvalProcess.step3: Olondoola embeera y'okukkiriza mu nnyiriri z'okukkirizibwa okulindirira
approvalProcess.tip: Yongera ebiwandiiko ng’oweereza ebirimu okuwa abeekenneenya ensonga ku kusalawo kwo okw’obuyiiya.

aboutGuide.title: Ebikwata ku & Enkola Ennungi
aboutGuide.description: Yiga Contentry ky’eri era ozuule enkola ennungi okulongoosa enkola yo ey’okukola ebirimu, ddiiru z’ekika, n’ebifaananyi by’abakulembeze.

whatIsContentry.intro: Contentry ye nkola ya AI-powered content intelligence platform eyategekebwa okuyamba abakola content, abasuubuzi, n’ebitongole okukola, okwekenneenya, n’okufulumya ebirimu ebikwatagana ku mutendera. Oba oli muntu ssekinnoomu oba ekitundu ku ttiimu ennene ey’okutunda, Contentry erongoosa enkola y’emirimu gyo egy’ebirimu.
whatIsContentry.missionDesc: Tukkiririza mu kuwa abayiiya amaanyi n’ebikozesebwa ebigezi ebikakasa nti buli kitundu ekirimu kiri ku kika, kikwata ku buwangwa, era nga kigoberera ebiragiro by’omukutu.
whatIsContentry.benefit1: Okukola ebirimu ebikozesebwa AI ebikwatagana n’eddoboozi lyo erya brand
whatIsContentry.benefit2: Okukebera okugoberera mu kiseera ekituufu ku byetaago by’amateeka
whatIsContentry.benefit3: Okwekenenya okukwata ku buwangwa eri abalabi b’ensi yonna
whatIsContentry.benefit4: Enkola y’emirimu gy’okukkiriza erongooseddwa eri ttiimu z’ebitongole
whatIsContentry.tip: Okuvuganya kugatta amaanyi ga AI n’okulondoola kw’abantu okutuusa ebirimu ebiwulikika n’abawuliriza bo ate ng’osigala ng’ogoberera amateeka.

keyFeatures.intro: Contentry ekuwa ekibinja ekijjuvu eky'ebikozesebwa okuddukanya obulamu bwo bwonna obw'ebirimu:
keyFeatures.aiContentDesc: Fulumya ebirimu eby’omutindo ogwa waggulu ebituukira ddala ku kika kyo n’abakuwuliriza:
keyFeatures.aiFeature1: Okukola ebirimu ku mikutu mingi (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram)
keyFeatures.aiFeature2: Amaloboozi g’okuwandiika agasobola okulongoosebwa (Eby’ekikugu, eby’akaseera obuseera, Ebisikiriza)
keyFeatures.aiFeature3: AI image generation okuwerekera posts zo
keyFeatures.complianceDesc: Kakasa nti ebirimu byo bituukiriza ebisaanyizo byonna nga tonnaba kufulumya:
keyFeatures.complianceFeature1: Okukebera okugoberera amateeka mu ngeri ey’obwengula okusinziira ku nkola za kkampuni
keyFeatures.complianceFeature2: Okuteeba obubonero mu by’obuwangwa eri abalabi ab’ensi yonna
keyFeatures.complianceFeature3: Okukebera akabi nga waliwo ebiteeso ebiyinza okukolebwako
keyFeatures.tip: Kozesa Strategic Profiles okukakasa nti eddoboozi lya brand likwatagana mu byonna ebikoleddwa.

bestPractices.intro: Okugoberera enkola zino ennungi kijja kukuyamba okufuna ebisingawo mu Contentry n'okukola ebirimu ebikola obulungi:
bestPractices.workflowDesc: Enkola y’emirimu etakyukakyuka ekakasa omutindo n’obulungi:
bestPractices.workflow1: Tandika nga oteekawo Strategic Profile yo nga olina ebiragiro ebikwata ku brand
bestPractices.workflow2: Okukola ebirimu ng’olina omukutu ogw’enjawulo n’abawuliriza mu birowoozo
bestPractices.workflow3: Bulijjo okwekenneenya ebirimu nga tonnabifulumya ku mikutu egy’ebweru
bestPractices.workflow4: Kozesa ebikozesebwa mu kuteekawo enteekateeka okukuuma cadence y'okuteeka ekwatagana
bestPractices.consistencyDesc: Okussaako obubonero obutakyukakyuka kizimba obwesige n’okumanyibwa:
bestPractices.consistency1: Teeka ekitabo kyo ekikulaga sitayiro ya brand ku Knowledge Base
bestPractices.consistency2: Kozesa Strategic Profile y’emu ku kampeyini ezikwatagana
bestPractices.consistency3: Weekenneenye ebirimu ebikoleddwa AI okukakasa nti bikwatagana n’eddoboozi lyo
bestPractices.warning: Bulijjo weetegereza ebirimu ebikoleddwa AI nga tonnabifulumya. Wadde nga AI yaffe ya maanyi, okulondoola kw’abantu kukakasa ebivaamu ebisinga obulungi.

optimizeContent.intro: Okukola ebirimu ebinene ntandikwa yokka. Laba engeri y'okulongoosaamu okusobola okufuna enkolagana ey'amaanyi:
optimizeContent.platformDesc: Buli mukutu gulina ebyetaago eby’enjawulo n’ebisuubirwa abalabi:
optimizeContent.platform1: LinkedIn: Essira lisse ku kutegeera kw’ekikugu, kozesa ebigambo ebikulu eby’amakolero, ffoomu empanvu ekkirizibwa
optimizeContent.platform2: Twitter/X: Obubaka obumpimpi, kozesa hashtags mu ngeri ey’obukodyo, kwatagana n’emitwe egy’omulembe
optimizeContent.platform3: Facebook: Ebirabika bikola bulungi, bikubiriza abantu okwenyigira mu bantu
optimizeContent.platform4: Instagram: Ebifaananyi eby’omutindo ogwa waggulu byetaagisa, kozesa hashtags ezikwatagana, Stories for engagement
optimizeContent.engagement1: Teeka buli kiseera mu biseera ebisinga obulungi eri abakuwuliriza
optimizeContent.engagement2: Kozesa okuyita okuwaliriza okukola mu bigambo byo
optimizeContent.engagement3: Ddamu ebiteeso era okwatagana n‟ekitundu kyo
optimizeContent.engagement4: Olondoola okwekenneenya okutegeera ebirimu ebisinga okukola obulungi
optimizeContent.tip: Kozesa ekintu kya Contentry eky'okuteekawo enteekateeka okuteeka mu biseera ebituufu awatali kufuba kwa ngalo.

brandDeals.intro: Enkolagana y’ebika (brand partnerships) eyinza okuba enyingiza ey’amaanyi. Laba engeri gy'oyinza okulongoosaamu enkola yo:
brandDeals.prep1: Kuuma ekifo ky’ebirimu eky’ekikugu, ekitali kikyukakyuka
brandDeals.prep2: Londoola era olage ebipimo byo eby’okwanjula
brandDeals.prep3: Zimba ekitabo ky’amawulire n’ebibalo byo eby’abantu n’okutuuka
brandDeals.prep4: Kozesa Contentry okukola ensonga z’ebirimu ebiriko akabonero k’ekyokulabirako
brandDeals.pitch1: Tanya eddoboozi lyo n’empisa z’ekibinja n’abawuliriza b’ogenderera
brandDeals.pitch2: Waayo ebirowoozo ebitongole ebirimu okusinga ebiteeso eby’enjawulo
brandDeals.pitch3: Muteekemu okwekenneenya okugoberera okulaga nti ebirimu byo bituukana n’ebiragiro
brandDeals.tip: Kozesa okukebera okugoberera kwa Contentry ng’okola ebirimu ebiwagirwa okukakasa nti ebisaanyizo bya FTC n’okubikkula ku mukutu bituukiddwaako.

influencerProfiles.intro: Strategic Profile yo gwe musingi gw’enkola yo ey’ebirimu. Laba engeri y'okugilongoosaamu:
influencerProfiles.setupDesc: Profaayili etegekeddwa obulungi ekakasa nti ebirimu ebikwatagana, ebiri ku kika:
influencerProfiles.setup1: Lambulula bulungi niche yo era target audience yo
influencerProfiles.setup3: Yongera ku by’obuwangwa n’ebitundu by’olowoozaako eri abakuwuliriza
influencerProfiles.setup4: Teeka ebiwandiiko ebijuliziddwa ebitegeeza eddoboozi lyo erya brand
influencerProfiles.optimizeDesc: Olongoosa buli kiseera profile yo okufuna ebirungi:
influencerProfiles.optimize1: Weekenneenye ebirimu ebikoleddwa era otereeze ensengeka za pulofayilo nga bwe kyetaagisa
influencerProfiles.optimize2: Tonda profile eziwera ku kampeyini oba abalabi ab’enjawulo
influencerProfiles.optimize3: Kuuma Knowledge Base yo nga etereezebwa n’ebiragiro ebipya ebikwata ku kika
influencerProfiles.tip: Weekenneenye Strategic Profile yo buli luvannyuma lwa myezi esatu okukakasa nti eraga ekibinja kyo ekikyukakyuka n’abawuliriza.

workflowsGuide.title: Enkola y'emirimu & Ekitabo ky'okuteeba
workflowsGuide.description: Yiga engeri enkola y’okugaba obubonero gy’ekola era otegeere buli mutendera gw’enkola y’emirimu okuva ku kwekenneenya ebirimu okutuuka ku kukkiriza.

scoring.intro: Enkola y’okuteeba mu Contentry ekuwa obubonero obwerufu, obusinziira ku peneti okukuyamba okutegeera engeri ebirimu byo gye bikolamu. Obubinja bwonna butandikira ku 100 era obubonero buggyibwako olw’okumenya amateeka ebitongole oba ensonga ezizuuliddwa.
scoring.overallScoreDesc: Obukodyo okutwalira awamu buba buzito bw’okugatta ensonga zonna ez’okwekenneenya, okuva ku 0 okutuuka ku 100:
scoring.scoreRange1: 80-100: Kirungi nnyo - Weetegefu okufulumya, ebirimu birongooseddwa nnyo
scoring.scoreRange2: 60-79: Kirungi - Ennongoosereza entonotono ezisemba nga tonnafulumya
scoring.scoreRange3: 40-59: Yeetaaga Okufaayo - Okwekenenya n’okuddamu okuddamu okwetaagisa
scoring.scoreRange4: 0-39: Flagged - Ensonga enkulu, tofulumya okutuusa nga zigonjoddwa
scoring.overallCalcDesc: Obukodyo okutwalira awamu bukozesa obuzito obukwatagana (adaptive weighting) okusinziira ku ddaala ly‟akabi:
scoring.overallCalc4: Obulabe Obukulu (Okugoberera ≤40): Okutwalira awamu obubonero hard-capped ku 40 maximum
scoring.componentsDesc: Obukodyo bwo okutwalira awamu bubalirirwa okuva mu bitundu bisatu ebikulu ng’okozesa enkola eyesigamiziddwa ku peneti:
scoring.component1: Obukodyo bw’okugoberera: Butandikira ku 100, aggyako obubonero buli kutyoboola okuzuulibwa
scoring.component2: Obukodyo bw’okutegeera kw’obuwangwa: Average of Hofstede’s 6 cultural dimensions
scoring.component3: Obukodyo bw’obutuufu: Butandikira ku 100, aggyako obubonero buli butatuufu oba ensonga ezuuliddwa
scoring.complianceDetailDesc: Buli post etandikira ku Compliance Score ya 100. Obubonero buggyibwako ku buli kutyoboola:
scoring.complianceSeverity1: Critical Violation (-60 pts): Okumenya NDA, okubikkula amawulire ag’ekyama → Obulabe bw’okukomya amangu
scoring.complianceSeverity2: Okumenya amateeka okw’amaanyi (-40 pts): Okutulugunyizibwa, okusosolwa, okwogera okw’obukyayi → Obulabe bw’okukola mu mateeka
scoring.complianceSeverity3: Okumenya amateeka amangi (-25 pts): Okubula kw’okulaga okulanga, okumenya enkola → Engasi/akabi k’okuyimiriza
scoring.complianceSeverity4: Okumenya amateeka okw’ekigero (-10 pts): Eddoboozi eritasaana, okukyama okutono mu ndagiriro → Okutendekebwa/okulabula
scoring.complianceSeverity5: Okugeza: Okubula #ad (-25) + Ensonga ya tone (-10) = Obukodyo obusembayo obwa 65
scoring.complianceAdjustment: Multiple violations stack - buli kibonerezo kikozesebwa nga kikuŋŋaanyiziddwa
scoring.complianceViolationTypes: Ebimenya amateeka ebikebereddwa: Ebikwata ku byama, Okutulugunyizibwa, okumenya NDA, Okubula okubikkula, Okumenya enkola, Eddoboozi eritasaana
scoring.culturalDetailDesc: Obukodyo bw’obuwangwa buba wakati w’ebipimo by’obuwangwa bwa Hofstede ebitongole mukaaga (0-100 buli kimu):
scoring.culturalDim1: Power Distance: Formality, okussa ekitiibwa mu buyinza vs. egalitarian, casual tone
scoring.culturalDim2: Okwefaako ssekinnoomu vs. Okugatta abantu: essira ‘Nze/Nze’ vs. ‘Ffe/Ffe’ okussa essira ku kitundu
scoring.culturalDim3: Obusajja n’obukyala: Olulimi oluvuganya/olukakafu vs. olukolagana/olukkiriziganya
scoring.culturalDim4: Okwewala obutali bukakafu: Amateeka, obukuumi, okussa essira ku kutegeera obulungi vs. okuggulawo eri obutategeeragana
scoring.culturalDim5: Okulungamya okw’ekiseera ekiwanvu: Essira ku mpeera z’omu maaso vs. amagoba ag’ekiseera ekitono
scoring.culturalDim6: Indulgence vs. Restraint: Olulimi olulina essuubi/okunyumirwa vs. olulimi oluterekeddwa/olufugibwa
scoring.culturalRisk: Obukodyo bw’ebyobuwangwa bwe bukka wansi wa 50, obuzito bwa ‘Reputation Risk’ bukozesebwa okukuuma ekibinja kyo mu balabi b’ensi yonna
scoring.accuracyDetailDesc: Buli post etandikira ku Accuracy Score ya 100. Obubinja buggyibwako ku nsonga ezizuuliddwa:
scoring.accuracyCheck1: Obutali butuufu Obukulu/Amawulire Amakyamu (-40 pts): Ebigambibwa eby’obulimba, data ezijingirire
scoring.accuracyCheck2: Ensonda ezitali za bwesige (-20 pts): Ebigambibwa okuva mu nsonda eziteesigika
scoring.accuracyCheck3: Unverifiable Claim (-10 pts): Ebigambo ebitasobola kukeberebwa mazima
scoring.accuracyCheck4: Okugeza: Okwewozaako okw’obulimba (-40) + Ensibuko etakakasiddwa (-20) = Obukodyo obusembayo obwa 40
scoring.accuracyCalc: Ensonga eziwera zituula - buli kibonerezo kikozesebwa nga kikuŋŋaanyiziddwa
scoring.flagStatusDesc: Ebirimu biteekebwako bendera mu ngeri ey’otoma okusinziira ku bivudde mu kwekenneenya:
scoring.flag1: Good Coverage (Green): Obubonero obusukka mu 80 - nga bwetegefu okufulumya
scoring.flag2: Yeetaaga Okufaayo (Yellow): Obubonero 60-79 - okulongoosa okutonotono kusemba
scoring.flag3: Flagged for Review (Orange): Obubonero 40-59 - okwekenneenya kwetaagisa nga tonnaba kufulumya
scoring.flag4: Ensonga Enzibu (Emmyuufu): Obubinja wansi wa 40 - tofulumya okutuusa nga bugonjoddwa
scoring.disclosureDesc: Ku bintu ebitumbula, enkola eno era ekebera:
scoring.disclosure1: Is Promotional: Ezuula oba ebirimu bilanga oba biwagirwa
scoring.disclosure2: Alina Okwolesebwa: Akebera oba #ad, #sponsored, oba partnership disclosure entuufu
scoring.disclosure3: Okugoberera ebitundu: Okukakasa ebisaanyizo bya FTC (US), EU, ne Norway eby’okulaga
scoring.disclosure4: Okubula okubikkula kuleeta Okumenya amateeka okw’amaanyi (obubonero -25) ku Bubonero bw’Okugoberera
scoring.tip: Obukodyo buddamu okubalirirwa buli lwe byekenneenyezebwa ebirimu. Kozesa ekintu kya Rewrite okulongoosa mu ngeri ey’otoma ebirimu ebifuna obubonero obutono ate ng’okuuma obubaka bwo.

analyze.intro: Enkola y’emirimu ey’okwekenneenya ebirimu ekuyamba okwekenneenya ebirimu ebiriwo okulaba oba bigoberera, okukwatagana n’obuwangwa, n’omutindo nga tonnafulumya.
analyze.stepsDesc: Goberera emitendera gino okwekenneenya ebirimu byo:
analyze.step1: Genda ku Content Intelligence > Yeekenneenya Ebirimu
analyze.step2: Teeka oba wandiika ebirimu byo mu kitundu ky’ebiwandiiko
analyze.step3: Londa Strategic Profile okussa mu nkola ebiragiro byo ku brand
analyze.step4: Okwesalirawo kebera ku 'Generate accompanying image' bw'oba oyagala AI okukola ekifaananyi
analyze.step5: Nywa ku 'Analyze' okuddukanya okwekenneenya mu bujjuvu
analyze.type1: Okukebera okugoberera: Kukakasa ebirimu okusinziira ku nkola n’ebiragiro by’omukutu (FTC, GDPR)
analyze.type2: Obuwulize mu buwangwa: Sikaani ebintu ebiyinza okunyiiza oba ebitali bya buwangwa
analyze.type3: Okukakasa obutuufu: Akebera ebigambibwa n’ensonga oba bituufu
analyze.type4: Brand Alignment: Egerageranya ebirimu n’ebiragiro byo ebya Strategic Profile
analyze.tip: Kozesa akabonero ka ‘Rewrite’ okulongoosa mu ngeri ey’otoma ebirimu ebifuna obubonero wansi wa 70. AI ejja kukola ku nsonga eziteekeddwako bendera ng’ekuuma obubaka bwo.

generate.intro: Enkola y’emirimu gy’okukola ebirimu ekozesa AI okukola ebirimu ebipya okusinziira ku mulamwa gwo, ebyetaago by’omukutu, n’ebiragiro by’ekika.
generate.step1: Genda ku Content Intelligence > Okukola ebirimu tab
generate.step2: Yingiza omulamwa gwo oba nnyonnyola ky’oyagala okutondawo
generate.step4: Londa Strategic Profile okusobola okukwatagana n’akabonero
generate.step5: Nywa ku 'Generate' okukola ebirimu ebikozesa AI
generate.optionsDesc: Teekateeka ebirimu byo ebikoleddwa n'enkola zino:
generate.option1: Okulonda Omukutu: Londa omukutu gumu oba omungi (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram)
generate.option2: Eddoboozi ly’okuwandiika: Londa okuva mu kikugu, eky’akaseera obuseera, eky’okubudaabudibwa, oba eky’amawulire
generate.option3: Obuwanvu bw’Ebirimu: Teekateeka obuwanvu bw’ekigendererwa ky’ebirimu byo
generate.option4: Okukola ekifaananyi: Toggle on okukola ekifaananyi ekiwerekerako ekikoleddwa AI
generate.tip: Ebirimu ebikoleddwa byekenneenyezebwa mu ngeri ey’otoma oluvannyuma lw’okutondebwa. Weekenneenye obubonero era okozese obutambi bw’okuddamu okuddamu okukola bwe kiba kyetaagisa.

schedulePrompt.intro: Schedule Prompt ekusobozesa okuteekawo okukola ebirimu mu ngeri ey’obwengula ekola mu biseera ebiragiddwa, okukuuma kalenda yo ey’ebirimu ng’ejjudde awatali kuyingirira mu ngalo.
schedulePrompt.howToDesc: Tonda ebibuuzo ebikola ebirimu mu ngeri ey'otoma:
schedulePrompt.step1: Tonda ekiragiro kyo eky'okukola ebirimu n'omulamwa n'ebyo by'oyagala
schedulePrompt.step2: Teekawo emirundi gy’enteekateeka (buli lunaku, buli wiiki, oba ennaku ezigere) .
schedulePrompt.step3: Londa ekiseera ebirimu we birina okukolebwa
schedulePrompt.step4: Ssobozesa 'Auto-analyze' okuddukanya okwekenneenya ku bikoleddwa mu ngeri ey'otoma
schedulePrompt.benefit1: Kuuma okuteeka ebintu mu ngeri etakyukakyuka nga tolina mirimu gya mikono gya buli lunaku
schedulePrompt.benefit2: Okukola ebirimu mu ssaawa ezisinga obulungi ez’okuyiiya
schedulePrompt.benefit3: Zimba ebirimu ebisigadde emabega okusobola okwekenneenya n’okukkirizibwa
schedulePrompt.tip: Ebiragiro ebitegekeddwa bivaamu ebirimu mu biwandiiko byo. Weekenneenye era okkirize nga tonnafulumya kulaba ku mutindo.

schedulePost.intro: Schedule Post ekusobozesa okuteeka mu nnyiriri ebirimu ebikkirizibwa okufulumya mu ngeri ey’otoma mu biseera ebisinga obulungi mu mikutu gyo egy’empuliziganya egy’oku yintaneeti.
schedulePost.step1: Okuva mu kulaba kwonna ebirimu, nyweza 'Schedule' mu kifo kya 'Publish Now'.
schedulePost.step3: Londa emikutu gy’empuliziganya egy’okuyungibwa gy’ogenda okufulumya
schedulePost.step4: Kakasa era yongera ku nnyiriri zo ezitegekeddwa
schedulePost.option1: Ekiseera Ekigere: Londa olunaku n’essaawa entuufu ey’okufulumya
schedulePost.option2: Ekiseera ekisinga obulungi: Leka AI eteese ku biseera ebisinga obulungi eby’okuteeka okusinziira ku data y’okwenyigira
schedulePost.option3: Multi-Platform: Tegeka ebirimu bye bimu ku mikutu mingi omulundi gumu
schedulePost.warning: Ebiwandiiko ebitegekeddwa byetaaga waakiri akawunti emu ey’emikutu gy’empuliziganya eyungiddwa. Gatta akawunti mu Settings > Social Profiles.

approval.intro: Enkola y’emirimu gy’okukkiriza ekakasa omutindo gw’ebirimu nga yeetaaga omuddukanya okwekenneenya nga tannafulumya. Kino kikulu nnyo naddala eri ttiimu z’ebitongole n’amakolero agafugibwa.
approval.processDesc: Engeri ebirimu gye bitambulamu okuyita mu nkola y'emirimu gy'okukkiriza:
approval.step1: Omutonzi aweereza ebirimu ng'anyiga ku 'Submit for Approval'.
approval.step2: Ebirimu birabika mu Ennyiriri z'Okukkiriza eza maneja
approval.step3: Maneja yeetegereza ebirimu, obubonero, n’ebivudde mu kwekenneenya
approval.step4: Manager akiriza, asaba enkyukakyuka, oba agaana ebirimu
approval.status2: Nga balindirira Okukkirizibwa: Eweereddwayo era erindiridde okwekenneenya kwa maneja
approval.status3: Ekkiriziddwa: Yetegefu okufulumya oba okuteekawo enteekateeka
approval.status4: Yeetaaga Okuddamu Okutunula: Maneja yasaba enkyukakyuka - kebera ebiteeso era oddemu okuweereza
approval.tip: Yongera ebiwandiiko ng’oweereza ebirimu okuwa abeekenneenya ensonga ku kusalawo kwo okw’obuyiiya. Kino kyanguya enkola y’okukkiriza.

confirmDelete.title: Kakasa Okusazaamu
confirmDelete.userMessage: Okakasa nti oyagala kusazaamu mukozesa ono? Ekikolwa kino tekiyinza kuddibwamu.
confirmDelete.bulkMessage: Okakasa nti oyagala kusazaamu bakozesa {{count}}? Ekikolwa kino tekiyinza kuddibwamu.

confirmCancelSubscription.title: Sazaamu Okwewandiisa
confirmCancelSubscription.message: Okakasa nti oyagala kusazaamu okuwandiika kw'omukozesa ono? Bajja kufiirwa okufuna ebikozesebwa eby’omutindo ogwa waggulu.

twoFactorAuth.title: Okukakasa Ebintu Bibiri
twoFactorAuth.description: Yongera ku layeri ey’obukuumi ey’enjawulo ku akawunti yo
twoFactorAuth.setupInstructions: Sika koodi eno eya QR ne app yo ey’okukakasa
twoFactorAuth.backupCodesDescription: Teeka koodi zino mu kifo ekirungi. Osobola okuzikozesa okuyingira ku akawunti yo singa ofiirwa ekyuma kyo ekikakasa.

platformSelector.title: Ebifo Ebigendereddwamu
platformSelector.description: Londa emikutu gy’oyinza okussaako ebirimu byo
platformSelector.aiWillOptimize: AI ejja kulongoosa ebirimu ku {{count}} platform
platformSelector.aiWillOptimizePlural: AI ejja kulongoosa ebirimu ku {{count}} platforms

postsTable.title: Ebiwandiiko byonna
postsTable.description: Dukanya era weekenneenye ebiwandiiko byo byonna

gdpr.weValuePrivacy: Tutwala Eby’ekyama Byo Nga Bya Mugaso
gdpr.cookieDescription: Tukozesa kukisi okutumbula obumanyirivu bwo mu kulaba, okuweereza ebirimu ebikukwatako, n’okwekenneenya entambula yaffe. Bw'onyiga ku "Kkiriza Byonna", oba okkirizza okukozesa kwaffe kukisi. Osobola okulongoosa by’oyagala oba okugaana kukisi ezitali za mugaso.
gdpr.essentialCookiesDesc: Ekyetaagisa okukakasa, obukuumi, n'emirimu emikulu. Tesobola kulema.
gdpr.analyticsCookiesDesc: Tuyambe okutegeera engeri abagenyi gye bakwataganamu n’omukutu gwaffe okutumbula empeereza yaffe.
gdpr.marketingCookiesDesc: Ekozesebwa okutuusa ebirango ebikukwatako n’okupima obulungi bwa kampeyini.
